faction_reputation_system.description: A system to track a player's standing with each of the major factions in the Aethel region, offering tangible rewards and consequences for their actions.

mechanic.scale: Reputation is tracked on a scale from -5 (Hated) to +5 (Allied), starting at 0 (Neutral).
mechanic.triggers: Reputation changes based on player actions that either align with or oppose a faction's ideology and goals.

reputation_tiers.description: You are considered a trusted friend and champion of the faction's cause.
potential_rewards: Access to faction-exclusive items (e.g., a Cartographer's all-terrain gear).
Gifts of special Pok√©mon (e.g., a rare egg from the Coastal Clan).
Access to unique Training Sessions with their top trainers.

reputation_tiers.description: You are a known associate and are treated with favor by faction members.
potential_rewards: Access to restricted areas within their headquarters.
Faction members will offer you unique side quests.

reputation_tiers.description: You are a neutral party. Faction members will treat you as they would any other stranger.
You are a known opponent of the faction. Members will be uncooperative or hostile.
potential_consequences: Faction members will refuse to sell you items or offer services.
You may be barred from entering faction-controlled towns or outposts.
More frequent hostile encounters from faction grunts in the wild.

reputation_tiers.description: You are a priority target for the faction. You will be actively hunted.
potential_consequences: Faction Admins or powerful members may be dispatched to eliminate you.
Large bounties may be placed on your head.
Allied factions may refuse to associate with you.
